**2023-05-17 / @aclements, @andybons, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- none

**Declined**

- **bytes: trim cap on Buffer.Bytes result** [#59570](https://go.dev/issue/59570)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **cmd/go: add -testlabel to print a label on the test package names** [#60128](https://go.dev/issue/60128)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **reflect: add generic variants of \`TypeOf()\` and \`ValueOf()\`** [#50741](https://go.dev/issue/50741)
  - duplicate of #60088
- **spec: lazy init imports to possibly import without side effects** [#38450](https://go.dev/issue/38450)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **text/template: add nil literal** [#57773](https://go.dev/issue/57773)
  - declined as infeasible

**Likely Accept**

- **cmd/go: add GOEXPERIMENT=gocacheprog to let a child process implement the internal action/output cache** [#59719](https://go.dev/issue/59719)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **cmp: new package with Ordered, Compare, Less; min, max as builtins** [#59488](https://go.dev/issue/59488)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **crypto/tls: support QUIC as a transport** [#44886](https://go.dev/issue/44886)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **go/ast: add 'func Unparen(Expr) Expr'** [#60061](https://go.dev/issue/60061)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **html/template: refuse to parse complex JS template literals** [#60055](https://go.dev/issue/60055)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **slices: add Reverse** [#58565](https://go.dev/issue/58565)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **slices: add sorting and comparison functions** [#60091](https://go.dev/issue/60091)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **spec: type inference should be more lenient about untyped numeric literals** [#58671](https://go.dev/issue/58671)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **x/tools/go/pointer: isolate, tag, and delete the pointer analysis** [#59676](https://go.dev/issue/59676)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳

**Likely Decline**

- **bufio: add Writer.UnwrittenData** [#59106](https://go.dev/issue/59106)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ⏳
- **cmd/go: allow \`go list\` to return the content of the \`go-source\` meta tag** [#59566](https://go.dev/issue/59566)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ⏳

  - discussion ongoing

- **reflect: add MakeType** [#60088](https://go.dev/issue/60088)
  - added to minutes

  - discussion ongoing
- **strings: add First** [#60204](https://go.dev/issue/60204)
  - added to minutes
- **strings: add new functions to deprecate strings.{Trim/TrimRight/TrimLeft} to avoid mistakes** [#50399](https://go.dev/issue/50399)
  - discussion ongoing
- **testing: add Name to track file and line of test case declaration** [#52751](https://go.dev/issue/52751)
  - commented
- **text/template, html/template: Add ExecuteFuncMap and ExecuteTemplateFuncMap** [#54450](https://go.dev/issue/54450)
  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes
  - commented
